channel.title: 'Postgres | Supabase Blog
channel.description: Latest Postgres news from Mark Burggraf at Supabase

item.title: SQL or NoSQL? Why not use both (with PostgreSQL)?
item.description: How to turn Postgres into an easy-to-use NoSQL database that retains all the power of SQL

item.title: Postgres WASM by Snaplet and Supabase
item.description: We're open sourcing postgres-wasm, a PostgresQL server that runs inside a browser, with our friends at Snaplet.
